case.title: Are you Oriental and a bit hard up - m4w - 44 (London)
case.text: Are you feeling naughty? Whether Japanese, Korean or Chinese I would love to meet you. Do you have expensive tastes. Maybe I can help. I simply want to meet someone for an hour or two of uncomplicated fun. I'm fit and good looking. I want to meet a fit 20-35 year old girl for adult fun. You need to be slim and fit. I can come to you or you we can meet at a hotel or my place. So if you are feeling naughty and would like to meet please reply to this ad and we'll see if we can meet up Simon
